jd: From: Abhishek Kumar, Tek inspirations LLC abhishek.kumar@tekinspirations.com Reply to: abhishek.kumar@tekinspirations.com Job Description :Service DesignerLocation: New York, New York/ HybridDuration: 6months · Have 5+ years of experience as a researcher, moderator, and strategist, specifically in user-centered design and business strategy.· Are skilled in design research methods such as ethnography, co-creation, and usability testing, and can connect customer insights with business strategies.· Can communicate complex ideas clearly to clients and stakeholders, and are experienced in leading client presentations and proposals.· Have a strategic mindset, with experience in envisioning new solutions, market validation, and problem-solving through both top-down and bottom-up analysis.· Are comfortable working directly with clients, understanding their business needs, and offering consultative insights.· Are collaborative and proactive, able to handle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment, while continuously improving processes.· Have experience in business development and are capable of helping companies with digital transformations aligned with customer needs.
